title: League wont start
body: The League of legends launcher will not start the League of Legends game. it will patch and update but when I choose to try and play the game it closes the launcher and nothing else happens.

replies.body:
The prevailing reason why League fails to launch is due to not having the right system permissions. Since League interacts with both files outside of the League folder, along with other software packages, it's necessary to assign it administrative permissions. You can find the most common solutions for this inside our [Permissions Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if those steps helped.
